description: Numbers that are congruent to {2, 3, 4} mod 7.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1)
formula: a(n+1) = 7*floor(n/3) +(n mod 3) +2. [From _Gary Detlefs_, Mar 09 2010]G.f. x*(2+x+x^2+3*x^3) / ( (1+x+x^2)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Dec 04 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
